normalised: Arre yaar, these electricity bills are getting out of hand! Last month, it was rupee five thousand five hundred, and this time, it's rupee six thousand two hundred! I'm starting to think my fridge is secretly mining Bitcoin. Maybe I should switch off all the lights and live by candlelight. It'll be romantic, and my bill will be just rupee fifty. Hmmm, actually, let's aim for rupee one hundred, need to keep the fan on at least!
